title: Bokura no Henbyoushi
sinopse:
1. Bokura no Henbyoushi (Our Change of Rythm)
2. Yuurei no Iru Machi (City of Spirits)
3. Genkoku Kyoshi RC-01 ( Teacher of the Current State RC-01)
4. Samete Mita Yume (The Sobering Dream)
5. Giniro Jitensha (The Silver Bike)
6. Konna Kanji (Like This)
7. Rokujou Gekijou (The Tatami Theater)
